default_support_action_text: If you have any questions, please contact our support service
default_warning_message_text: If this wasn't you, please contact our support team immediately
verification_text: Your email has not been verified yet
change_email_text: To confirm the email change, enter the code below in your personal account settings
setting_update_verification_message_text: To confirm settings update on the platform, enter the code below in your personal account settings
user_registration_message_text: You have successfully registered on DV.net. Now you have access to all platform features
external_wallet_requested_message_text: Here is the list of your active wallets on the DV.net platform
invite_user_email_subject: Invitation to role in the service
invite_user_message_text: You have been invited to the role {{InviteUserRole}} in our service. To accept the invitation, click the link
invite_user_alternative_action_text: If the button doesn't work, click the link
user_access_key_changed_message_text: We confirm your request to change access keys from your DV.net account
user_authorization_from_new_device_messa: we inform you that a new device has been authorized in your account on the DV.net platform
user_authorization_from_new_device_secur: Secure your account immediately by changing your password.
user_forgot_password_message_text: We received a request to reset your password for your platform account. To reset your password, enter the code below in your personal account settings
user_forgot_password_action_warning_text: If you didn't initiate this action, you can safely ignore this email
user_password_changed_message_text: Your password has been changed successfully
user_email_reset_message_text: Your email has been changed successfully to
remind_verification_message_text: We remind you that you need to verify your email on the platform. To do this, request verification code in your personal account settings
user_test_email_message_text: This is a test email to verify that your SMTP server configuration is working correctly.
user_test_email_no_action_text: No action is required on your part. This is an automated test to verify your SMTP server configuration and email delivery capabilities.
two_factor_authentication_enabled_messag: We confirm the successful activation of two-factor authentication (2FA) for your account. This additional security measure helps protect your account.
two_factor_authentication_disabled_messa: We confirm the deactivation of two-factor authentication (2FA) for your account. Please note that your account is now protected by your password only.
